name: Escape From The Kangaroo Occultists
description:
A group of kangaroo mask-wearing occultists are trying to sacrifice you!

Run to escape from a grisly fate, but can you save more than yourself?

The game can be played with an Xbox controller or WASD/Arrow Keys. Press F Key to switch between Full Screen and Windowed mode.

Find each rooms exit! Collect food to keep your health up! And if you can ... SAVE THE KOALAS!

Made for Adelaide Global Game Jam 2016, the theme was "Ritual"

Team:

  • Gameplay Programming: stomygame
  • All the Art, Most of the levels: Vela Noble (velanoble)
  • Cutscenes, Menus, Controls, Programming, Updates: Andrew Dunn (techghoul)
  • Audio recording & implementation, Loot items, AI Programming, Remaining levels: Jonathon Hart (jonathondhart)

Jam Page: http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/escape-kangaro...

Music Credit: "Tafi Maradi" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Note: If playing on Mac or Linux, Java must be installed on your computer.
